nodes.text: Skyway Flyer was a company that produced Coruscant airspeeders prior to the Clone Wars. At one point, when Lott Dod was caught in an accident on Coruscant and placed into the hospital, Twi'lek Senator Orn Free Taa joked on the Amberdawn morning show that Dod's probably going to file a lawsuit against Skyway Flyer for allegedly having anti-Neimoidian sentiment, but was later forced to make a public apology when Dod called Taa's remarks outrageous.
